sentences.en: Danny, don’t bother Ellen while she’s reading.
sentences.cn: 丹尼，埃伦看书的时候不要去打扰她 。

sentences.en: He didn't bother to switch on the light.
sentences.cn: 他懒得去开灯。

sentences.en: I usually buy sliced bread – it's less bother.
sentences.cn: 我通常买切片面包–这样可以少些麻烦。

sentences.en: I usually buy sliced bread — it's less bother.
sentences.cn: 我通常都买切片面包——比较省事。

sentences.en: I wouldn't want to cause such important people as yourselves any bother.
sentences.cn: 我不想给你们这样的大人物添任何麻烦。

sentences.en: I'll drive you back to your hotel later. It's no bother.
sentences.cn: 我一会儿会开车把你送回宾馆，举手之劳。

sentences.en: I'm terribly sorry to bother you at this hour.
sentences.cn: 这个时候打搅您，我万分抱歉。

sentences.en: It’s an old car, but it’s never caused me any bother.
sentences.cn: 这是辆旧车，但从来不给我添麻烦。

sentences.en: Most men hate the bother of shaving.
sentences.cn: 大多数男士嫌刮胡子麻烦。

sentences.en: Mr Brooke is undoubtedly in a spot of bother.
sentences.cn: 布鲁克先生肯定遇到了点小麻烦。

sentences.en: Never bother about people's opinions.
sentences.cn: 不要在意人们的看法。

sentences.en: Nothing I do makes any difference anyway, so why bother?
sentences.cn: 既然我做什么都于事无补，我为什么还要费劲呢？

sentences.en: Now don't talk so loud and bother him, honey.
sentences.cn: 亲爱的，好了，别这么大声说话打扰他。

sentences.en: That kind of jealousy doesn't bother me.
sentences.cn: 那种嫉妒我并不在意。

sentences.en: The courts take too long and going to the police is a bother.
sentences.cn: 庭审太费时间，去警察局是件麻烦事。

sentences.en: The sauce is thick and rich so don't bother trying to diet.
sentences.cn: 这个酱汁又浓又香，别费劲节食了。

sentences.en: they couldn't be bothered to look it up.
sentences.cn: 他们根本不想花力气去查这件事。

sentences.en: Vince is having a spot of bother with the law.
sentences.cn: 文斯惹上了点儿官司。

sentences.en: Why bother to go abroad, when there are so many nice places here?
sentences.cn: 这里有这么多好地方，干吗还要费事去国外？

sentences.en: Would it bother you if I put on some music?
sentences.cn: 我放点音乐会你介意吗？

sentences.en: You needn't bother about coming up, I'll look after him.
sentences.cn: 你不用来了, 我会照料他.

sentences.en: You seem to have got yourself into a spot of bother.
sentences.cn: 你似乎让自己遇上了点麻烦。

sentences.en: Your coming relieved me of the bother of writing a long letter.
sentences.cn: 你来了,省去我写长信的麻烦了.

（因焦虑或身体不适而感到）心急火燎

trans.tran_cn: 真讨厌（表示对某人/事烦恼）
麻烦，困难，令人烦恼的事/人
trans.tran_en: trouble or difficulty that has been caused by small problems and that usually only continues for a short time

trans.tran_cn: 麻烦，操心，使苦恼，打扰，纠缠，使疼痛
trans.tran_en: to make the effort to do something
to annoy someone, especially by interrupting them when they are trying to do something
